name: abandonment dungeon
description:
Controls wasd = move, spacebar = attack, Q = change between characters

Game for  Mini Jame Gam #9

the idea I had for this game was wanting to make a roguelike game where after every level/boss/something else you have to offer one of your characters, then you get the choice of at set of new characters.

unfortunately I am not an experienced game dev this making this game to be all I wanted in three days is not something I was able to do. I do like the idea I came up with though so I may one day actually make what I envisioned but until then this is what it is.
